Name: TrainFormation
About the game: TrainFormation is a simple, fast-paced puzzle game created by one student as a university project. Place rails in front of an ever-accelerating train to cross procedurally generated levels, reach stations, collect power ups and make it as far as you can! Build a path for the train Swap hexagonal tiles to create a path for the train. Make sure to find the matching rails and terrain, or the train will not make it through! ⠀ Reach stations and collect power ups Make it to a station and take a moment to breathe. Use specific rail tiles to collect power ups to help you in your toughest moments! ⠀ Make it as far as you can Reach new levels and face the difficult terrain. Hold on tight as the train continues to accelerate! ⠀
